name: Trust agreement, required
text:
PART II.  TRUST AGREEMENTS

     (a)  Each participating member shall enter into and, concurrently therewith, receive an executed copy of a trust agreement, which shall govern the collection and disposition of all funds of the interindemnity arrangement.
	(b)  The trust agreement shall, as a minimum, provide for meeting all requirements of this part. [L 1977, c 182, pt of §1]
